mapper.select: select SELLER_SPECIALTY,SELLER_DESCRIPTION,SELLER_IMAGE,SELLER_NICKNAME,GOODS_NUM,GOODS_CATEGORY,GOODS_NAME,GOODS_PRICE,GOODS_IMAGE1,GOODS_IMAGE2,GOODS_IMAGE3 from seller_tbl inner join goods_tbl on goods_tbl.member_num = seller_tbl.member_num where goods_tbl.member_num in(select member_num from goods_tbl where goods_num in(select goods_num from cart_tbl where member_num = #{memberNum}))
